item.title: Traders eye the 20-day moving average on the S&P 500 as a critical level for the market
item.description: Whether the S&P 500 can hold its 20-day moving average after Friday's downdraft is critical for the stock market's short-term outlook, according to NY...

item.title: JPMorgan Chase says it will invest $10 billion into industries critical for national security
item.description: The move helps JPMorgan Chase organize its activities around national interests at a time of heightened tensions between the U.S. and China.

item.title: Goldman Sachs agrees to acquire $7 billion VC firm Industry Ventures
item.description: Goldman Sachs is making the acquisition to bolster its $540 billion alternatives investment platform, part of the "growth engine" of the investment ba...

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Broadcom, Bloom Energy, Critical Metals, Fastenal and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest midday moves.

item.title: Wharton's Jeremy Siegel says it's 'scandalous' the U.S. doesn't have a rare earths reserve
item.description: Siegel told CNBC's "Squawk Box" that the U.S. should create a rare earth minerals reserve as rising trade tensions threaten global supply chains.
